2.speaker: Gale
2.text: I must tell you, Shadowheart, the bathing waters here leave much to be desired.
2.context: NodeContext: A bit know it all

1.speaker: Gale
1.text: The ablutions offered at the Temple of Beauty in Waterdeep are far superior. And they have the most excellent soaps.
1.context: NodeContext: A bit know it all

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Hmm. I was wondering why you always smelled like a wealthy dowager.
